markdownRemark.html: Located outside of the city of Malaga and very close to the airport and the Plaza Mayor shopping center. Over the years, this course - the oldest in Andalusia - has been transformed into one that is both demanding for professional players and accessible for newbies.

frontmatter.title: Parador de Málaga Golf
frontmatter.description: Parador de Málaga Golf - Located outside of the city of Malaga and very close to the airport and the Plaza Mayor shopping center. Over the years, this course - the oldest in Andalusia - has been transformed into one that is both demanding for professional players and accessible for newbies.
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 76.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 76.00 euros
